body:
Hi everyone,



I have imported an IDF and create new schedule based on occupancy and all the definition works.

I would like to optimize the results using octopus but after 3 simulation the energy plus run component stops working (also after 3 simulations run manually). In attached you can find the figure with errors and the GH definition.

Someone can you help me?



Thanks in advance. 

Best,



Andrea

replies.body:
I'm sorry i have forgotten the idf file.

In attached you can find the idf.



Thanks again.

Best,



Andrea
